item.title: Mark Zuckerberg says India is the largest market for Meta AI usage
item.description:
WhatsApp’s massive 500 million user in India has supercharged Meta’s AI ambitions. Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg said Wednesday that India is the largest market in terms of Meta AI usage, a notable milestone considering the product launched in India just a few months ago. Zuckerberg said during Meta’s second-quarter earnings call that people have used […]
